CCAPI
Class FinancialLibrary

java.lang.Object
  CCAPI.FinancialLibrary
public class FinancialLibrary
extends java.lang.Object

A financial library implementation, provides technical analysis routines. please report all errors, extensions and bugfixes if possible. This class provides works mostly on close values of candles, but provides function to use open, hi, low instead of close, too.
Throughout the library skipdays is used to skip days from the used dataset. For example: to calculate the simple mean ten day average of two days ago, you need to call SMA(10, candles, 2); where candles contains your vector of candles.

REMINDER: Vector.elementAt(0) is the newest candle!!!

Author:
us

starc

public double[] starc(java.util.Vector v,
                      int closeAverage,
                      int truerangeAverage,
                      double factor1,
                      double factor2,
                      int skipdays)
returns the starc bands in a double array, val[0] lower starc band, val[3] upper starc band use val[1] + val[2] for the factor1 starc bands. factor1 defines the band for the inner starc bands, factor2 defines the amout for the outer starc bands, good parameter settings are: v/20/14/2/3.

Parameters:
v -
closeAverage -
truerangeAverage -
factor1 -
factor2 -
Returns:
